name: cobalt
title: Cobalt
description: Download videos and audio from popular social media platforms with ease.
author: aelew

commands.name: index
commands.title: Download Media
commands.subtitle: Cobalt
commands.description: Download video and/or audio from social media with customizable settings.

preferences.name: downloadDirectory
preferences.title: Download Directory
preferences.description: Where Cobalt should save downloaded files.

preferences.name: apiInstanceUrl
preferences.title: API Instance URL
preferences.description: Want to use a different Cobalt API instance? Change your instance URL here!

preferences.name: filenamePattern
preferences.title: File Name Style
preferences.description:
How downloaded files should be named.

Classic: Default file name pattern.
Basic: Title and basic info in brackets.
Pretty: Title and info in brackets.
Nerdy: Title and all info in brackets.

Some services don't support rich file names and will always use the classic style.

preferences.name: notifyOnDownload
preferences.label: Notify on Successful Download
preferences.description: Sends you a notification when your download is complete.

preferences.name: muteVideoAudio
preferences.label: Mute Video Audio
preferences.description: Removes the audio from video downloads when possible.

preferences.name: twitterGif
preferences.label: Twitter: Convert GIFs to .gif
preferences.description: Changes whether Twitter GIFs are converted to .gif or not. May reduce quality and increase file size.

preferences.name: downloadOriginalTikTokSound
preferences.label: TikTok: Use Original Audio
preferences.description: Downloads the original sound used in the TikTok video without any additional changes by the post's author.

preferences.name: tiktokH265
preferences.label: TikTok: Prefer H.265/HEVC Videos
preferences.description: Downloads 1080p videos from TikTok in H.265/HEVC format when available.
